level Original Poster points year ago There were several street preachers out there.
One was nice, very passive man, with couple of kids who couldn’t have been more than ten years old handing out information in sealed envelopes.
They were very pleasant.
Then, at about 5:40 pm, some jackass street preacher showed up with megaphone and started preaching about, “The real Jesus blah blah blah.”
vowed to never be that guy.
It’s pretty easy to not be that guy when ya don’t believe that Mormons are “going to hell” because they don’t believe in the right Jesus.
just wanted to plant few seeds and make few people laugh.
Other than the little prick that put his hand on my shoulder and flipped off the camera, didn’t come across anyone that wanted to throat punch.
If the little prick had left his hand on my shoulder for about three more seconds would’ve told him to remove his hand from my shoulder or be prepared to have it broken.
Continue this thread level points year ago Well, that was thoroughly amazing!
Keep up the good works, Mike!

level Original Poster 10 points year ago The mic is real and plugged into the camera.
Although the mic doesn’t pick up much if the source isn’t right in front of it, everyone within thirty feet in front of me and at least twenty feet behind me could hear my voice crystal clear.
really don’t think encountered anyone who seemed to be upset with me.
wasn’t exactly preaching repentance to them either.
just wanted to plant few seeds and have few laughs.
think was successful at both.
